Venture Cycle Events

Join us for your next cycle adventure!

Venture Cycle Events are a leading cycle sportive company based in the heart of the New Forest. We deliver expertly run cycling events across the South of England, offering scenic routes, professional support and an unforgettable riding experience. From epic coastal routes to serene countryside challenges, our sportives cater for all abilities and celebrate the best of what the South of England has to offer.

Rider Checklist

Bike & Gear
  • Your bike: Well maintained and suited to the ride that you have entered. Please ensure all batteries are charged.
  • Helmet: A well fitting, a helmet is mandatory for all of our events.
  • Clothing: Weather appropriate for the day.
Repair & Essentials
  • Inner tubes: Bring at least two spares.
  • Tyre levers: Two is possible.
  • Mini pump: Compatible with your valve type.
  • Multi-tool: Ideally with a chain breaker.
Nutrition & Hydration
  • Water bottles: Filled with electrolyte drinks.
  • Snacks: Gels, bars or flapjacks.
  • Electrolyte tabs: Especially for long or hot rides.
Navigation & Safety
  • GPS head unit: Route file loaded and checked.
  • Phone: Fully charged with emergency contact saved.
  • Lights: Rear lights are mandatory at our events.
  • Cash/card: For use in emergencies.
